message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1200000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that. Can you consider my offer?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to come down to $1100000, but I don't think I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I understand that you need to make a profit, but I'm still trying to be reasonable. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, and I'm offering $950000. Can you consider my offer?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm still not willing to give up too much profit. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1050000. Can you consider this offer?

I'm getting close to walking away from the deal, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $1000000, but that's my final offer. If you can't meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John.
